about_the_game:
Cooking with Magic is a chaotic and fun cooperative game where players take on the role of witches and wizards working together in a magical kitchen.

Welcome to the Arcane Academy, a place where young magic apprentices become masters of the art of magical cuisine. Here, the secrets of the legendary gourmet alchemist, Master Savorix, are passed down from generation to generation.

The time is approaching for the Tournament of Magical Cutlery, a culinary competition among apprentices from different magical regions. This annual event celebrates not only excellence in cooking but also the unity and friendship between talented young wizards.

However, something dark is happening at the academy. Rare and valuable ingredients are disappearing from the storerooms, and the dishes prepared by the apprentices are coming out with unexpected magical effects. There’s a tension in the air and a mystery to be unraveled.

Players take on the roles of apprentices from different magical regions, joining forces in improvised teams to participate in the Tournament of Magical Cutlery. They must work together to prepare challenging magical dishes, from edible potions to enchanted feasts, all while racing against the clock and solving puzzles across various parts of the academy.

As the tournament progresses, players uncover clues about the culinary incidents. While the pressure of the competition rises, they must also investigate and solve the mystery behind the culinary chaos before the academy’s reputation is tarnished and the tournament is canceled.

With magic, teamwork, and the perfect blend of culinary and magical skills, players will need to save the Tournament of Magical Cutlery and restore trust in the Arcane Academy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN 10/11-32/64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600k
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN 10/11-32/64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-650 / AMD A10-5800K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 / Radeon HD 7510
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
